page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT OF THE VILLAGERS
page.content: 98 adults live in Sutton,20 are retired and 12 wives do not go out to work. There is no male unemployment. BUSINESS OWNERS-Tyre Firm,Animal Foodstuffs Factory,Agriculteral Machinery Repair,P.O.& Shop,Cacti Farm,Building,Garages-2,Milk Round,Contractor,Auctioneer,Carpet Factory. 12 Farmers-working family farms,6 teachers,5 office workers,3 executive salesmen and 1 each of the following-doctor, vet,bank manager,I.C.I. Executive, hospital administrator,council worker, physiotherapist,Director of Double-Glazing Firm,probation officer,architect, accountant,oil-rig worker,civil engineer,builder, cook, bus driver, and housekeeper. 8 females are employed part-time either as cleaners or bar staff.
